text: Inhibition of GP - induced NFkappaB , <extra_id_0> NFAT <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> NFIL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> DNA binding to the <extra_id_0> IL-1RA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter .

A , A representative autoradiogram ( lane 1 : control , lane 2 : GP , lane 3 : GP + unlabeled mutated NFATP2 / 3 oligo , lane 4 : GP + CAPE , lane 5 : GP + CyA , lane 6 : GP + CHX , lane 7 : GP + unlabeled NFATP2 / 3 oligo , lane 8 : water ) as well as a graphical summary for the NFATP2 / 3 site , depicting a decrease in binding following inhibition when compared to GP is displayed ( * = p < 0.05 ) .
Data are shown as mean +/- SEM ( n = 4 ) .

B , Inhibition of NFkappaB , <extra_id_0> NFAT <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> NFIL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> resulted in decreased <extra_id_0> IL-1RA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA following CHX , CAPE or CyA compared to GP .
<extra_id_0> GAPDH <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is used as housekeeping control ( representative gel , n = 4 ) .

C , Inhibition of NFkappaB , <extra_id_0> NFAT <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> NFIL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> significantly reduced the production of <extra_id_0> IL-1RA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> by human PBMC following treatment with CHX , CAPE or CyA when compared to GP ( * = p < 0.05 ; ** = p < 0.01 ) .
Data are shown as mean +/- SEM ( n = 3 ) .
